topics.body:
So I read something really interesting; the usa will probably experience a extremely drastic cultural shift because cable television is dying.

What is happening right now cable television wise is that cable tv is dying and companies are trying multiple options:
1)they're shrinking the number of channels drastically
2)they're experimenting with internet telvision
3)they're trying to mimic netflix


What is probably going to happen in the long run is that internet tv is going to replace cable tv.

The difference?  On the internet you don't need the FCC to give a age rating for your show.
